author: Katy McLaughlin
title: Hollywood Producer Joel Silver Sells Malibu Home for $38 Million
text:
Film producer Joel Silver sold his Malibu, Calif., home for $38 million on Thursday, according to sources familiar with the transaction. Mr. Silver’s credits include the “Lethal Weapon,” “Die Hard” and “Matrix” franchises.
According to the listing, the five-bedroom house, with a pool and tennis court, sits on ¾-acre with full frontage on Carbon Beach, an exclusive area where Oracle co-founder Larry Ellison owns multiple properties and where music impresario David Geffen sold a mansion for $85 million last year. Mr. Silver...
